TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Keyboard extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于访问键盘当前状态（如当前按下了哪些键）的属性，并提供了用于将击键发送到活动窗口的方法。

span.span: Provides properties for accessing the current state of the keyboard, such as what keys are currently pressed, and provides a method to send keystrokes to the active window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard`计算机的键盘为接口提供的对象。The `My.Computer.Keyboard` object provides an interface to the computer's keyboard. 属性`My.Computer.Keyboard`提供几个特殊键的状态有关的信息。The properties of the `My.Computer.Keyboard` provide information about the state of several special keys. `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法使你可以将密钥发送到活动窗口，就像它们具有已键入键盘上输入一样。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method lets you send keys to the active window as if they have been typed at the keyboard. ## 任务Tasks 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Keyboard`对象。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Keyboard` object. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |将击键发送到应用程序Send keystrokes to an application|[如何：启动应用程序并向其发送击键 (Visual Basic)How to: Start an Application and Send it Keystrokes (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-start-an-application-and-send-it-keystrokes.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown`属性来确定按下计算机的 CTRL 键。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's CTRL key is pressed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#36)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AltKeyDown As Boolean
public: property bool AltKeyDown { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，该值指示是否按下了 Alt 键。

span.span: Gets a indicating if the ALT key is down.

value.span: 一个 值：如果按下了 Alt 键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A value: if the ALT key is down; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown`属性提供的功能类似于属性。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown`属性来确定是否按下计算机的 ALT 键。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.AltKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's ALT key is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#23)]

public: property bool CapsLock { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，该值指示 Caps Lock 是否已打开。

span.span: Gets a indicating if CAPS LOCK is turned on.

value.span: 一个 值：如果 Caps Lock 已打开，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A value: if CAPS LOCK is turned on; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回仅 caps LOCK 键的状态。Only the state of CAPS LOCK is returned. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock`属性来确定计算机的 CAPS LOCK 已开启。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CapsLock` property to determine if the computer's CAPS LOCK is turned on. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown`属性提供的功能类似于属性。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown`属性来确定是否按下计算机的 CTRL 键。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.CtrlKeyDown` property to determine if the computer's CTRL key is down. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回仅 SCROLL LOCK 键的状态。Only the state of the SCROLL LOCK key is returned. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock`属性来确定计算机的 SCROLL LOCK 键是否亮起。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ScrollLock` property to determine if the computer's SCROLL LOCK key is on. summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SendKeys(string keys) cil managed

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法提供的功能类似于和方法。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. `wait`参数非常有用，如果在你的应用程序可以继续之前，必须完成其他应用程序。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 由于没有激活其他应用程序的托管的方法，你可以使用此类当前应用程序中，手动选择窗口发送键，或使用 Windows API 方法，如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`、 将焦点强制上其他应用程序。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 调用 Windows Api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys`自变量可以指定任何单个项或任何与键组合 ALT、 CTRL 或 SHIFT （或这些密钥的任意组合）。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每个键表示由一个或多个字符，如`a`字符"a"，或`{ENTER}`ENTER 键。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要将某个键组合使用 shift 键，在前面使用的键代码`+`（加号）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要将某个键组合使用 CTRL，在前面使用的键代码`^`（插入符号）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要将某个键与 ALT 组合，在前面使用的键代码`%`（百分号）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重复键，使用该窗体`{`*键数*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 必须放置之间留一个空格*密钥*和*数*。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 例如，`{LEFT 42}`意味着"按向左的箭头键 42 次";`{h 10}`表示"按 'h' 10 次。"For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出可用于指定当按下 （如 ENTER 或选项卡上） 的相应密钥时不会显示的字符的代码。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |键Key|代码Code| |-|-| |退格符BACKSPACE|{退格符} 或 {BS}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |中断BREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |大写锁定CAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|{清除}{CLEAR}| |DELETEDELETE|{删除} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下键DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |EndEND|{结束}{END}| |Enter 键 （数字键盘）ENTER (numeric keypad)|{输入}{ENTER}| |EnterENTER|~| |EscESC|{转义} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |帮助HELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |HomeHOME|{主页}{HOME}| |InsINS|{插入}{INSERT}| |向左键LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |NUM LOCKNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |返回RETURN|{返回}{RETURN}| |向右键RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |SCROLL LOCKSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TabTAB|{选项卡}{TAB}| |向上键UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |F1 到 F15F1 through F15|{F1} 通过 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法若要将击键发送到外部应用程序，计算器应用程序，通过启动`Shell`函数。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Calculator application, started by the `Shell` function. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#25)] 如果找不到具有请求的进程标识符的应用程序，则会引发 异常。A exception is raised if an application with the requested process identifier cannot be found. 对 `Shell` 函数的调用需要完全信任（ 类）。The call to the `Shell` function requires full trust ( class).

exception.span: 存在部分信任的情况，此时用户缺少足够的权限。

span.span: A partial-trust situation exists in which the user lacks necessary permissions.

permission.span: 控制文件和文件夹的访问权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
Associated enumeration: .

permission.span: 控制用户界面和剪贴板相关的权限。

span.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the clipboard.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SendKeys (string keys, bool wait);
.method public instance void SendKeys(string keys, bool wait) cil managed
Public Sub SendKeys (keys As String, wait As Boolean)
public: void SendKeys(System::String ^ keys, bool wait);

span.span: A that defines the keys to send.

param.name: wait

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 一个 值，指定在应用程序继续之前是否等待键击处理完成。

span.span: A that specifies whether or not to wait for keystrokes to get processed before the application continues.
by default.

summary.span: 向活动窗口发送一个或多个键击，就像在键盘键入一样。

span.span: Sends one or more keystrokes to the active window, as if typed on the keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法提供的功能类似于和方法。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method provides functionality similar to the and methods. `wait`参数非常有用，如果在你的应用程序可以继续之前，必须完成其他应用程序。The `wait` argument is useful if the other application must finish before your application can continue. > [!NOTE] > 由于没有激活其他应用程序的托管的方法，你可以使用此类当前应用程序中，手动选择窗口发送键，或使用 Windows API 方法，如`FindWindow`和`SetForegroundWindow`、 将焦点强制上其他应用程序。Because there is no managed method to activate another application, you can either use this class within the current application, manually select the window to send the keys to, or use Windows API methods, such as `FindWindow` and `SetForegroundWindow`, to force focus on other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 调用 Windows Api](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Calling Windows APIs](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/walkthrough-calling-windows-apis.md). `keys`自变量可以指定任何单个项或任何与键组合 ALT、 CTRL 或 SHIFT （或这些密钥的任意组合）。The `keys` argument can specify any single key or any key combined with ALT, CTRL, or SHIFT (or any combination of those keys). 每个键表示由一个或多个字符，如`a`字符"a"，或`{ENTER}`ENTER 键。Each key is represented by one or more characters, such as `a` for the character "a", or `{ENTER}` for the ENTER key. 若要将某个键组合使用 shift 键，在前面使用的键代码`+`（加号）。To combine a key with SHIFT, precede the key code with `+` (plus sign). 若要将某个键组合使用 CTRL，在前面使用的键代码`^`（插入符号）。To combine a key with CTRL, precede the key code with `^` (caret). 若要将某个键与 ALT 组合，在前面使用的键代码`%`（百分号）。To combine a key with ALT, precede the key code with `%` (percent sign). 若要指定重复键，使用该窗体`{`*键数*`}`。To specify repeating keys, use the form `{`*key number*`}`. 必须放置之间留一个空格*密钥*和*数*。You must put a space between *key* and *number*. 例如，`{LEFT 42}`意味着"按向左的箭头键 42 次";`{h 10}`表示"按 'h' 10 次。"For example, `{LEFT 42}` means "press the LEFT ARROW key 42 times"; `{h 10}` means "press 'h' 10 times." 下表列出可用于指定当按下 （如 ENTER 或选项卡上） 的相应密钥时不会显示的字符的代码。The following table lists the codes that can be used to specify characters that are not displayed when you press the corresponding key (such as ENTER or TAB). |键Key|代码Code| |-|-| |退格符BACKSPACE|{退格符} 或 {BS}{BACKSPACE} or {BS}| |中断BREAK|{BREAK}{BREAK}| |大写锁定CAPS LOCK|{CAPSLOCK}{CAPSLOCK}| |清除CLEAR|{清除}{CLEAR}| |DELETEDELETE|{删除} 或 {DEL}{DELETE} or {DEL}| |向下键DOWN ARROW|{DOWN}{DOWN}| |EndEND|{结束}{END}| |Enter 键 （数字键盘）ENTER (numeric keypad)|{输入}{ENTER}| |EnterENTER|~| |EscESC|{转义} 或 {ESC}{ESCAPE} or {ESC}| |帮助HELP|{HELP}{HELP}| |HomeHOME|{主页}{HOME}| |InsINS|{插入}{INSERT}| |向左键LEFT ARROW|{LEFT}{LEFT}| |NUM LOCKNUM LOCK|{NUMLOCK}{NUMLOCK}| |PAGE DOWNPAGE DOWN|{PGDN}{PGDN}| |PAGE UPPAGE UP|{PGUP}{PGUP}| |返回RETURN|{返回}{RETURN}| |向右键RIGHT ARROW|{RIGHT}{RIGHT}| |SCROLL LOCKSCROLL LOCK|{SCROLLLOCK}{SCROLLLOCK}| |TabTAB|{选项卡}{TAB}| |向上键UP ARROW|{UP}{UP}| |F1 到 F15F1 through F15|{F1} 通过 {F15}{F1} through {F15}| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys`方法若要将击键发送到外部应用程序，计算器应用程序，通过启动`Shell`函数。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.SendKeys` method to send keystrokes to an external application, the Calculator application, started by the `Shell` function. value.span: 如果 SHIFT 键处于按下状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a SHIFT key is down; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown`属性提供的功能类似于属性。The `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property provides functionality similar to the property. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown`属性来确定计算机的 SHIFT 键的其中一个是否关闭。This example uses the `My.Computer.Keyboard.ShiftKeyDown` property to determine if one of the computer's SHIFT keys is down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#47)]
